author: Deleted User
content:
Hi everyone!
I am analysing the contract's storage on mainnet with the goal of producing diagrams/charts with the findings. 

Can anyone confirm my assumption that if I run geth with `--syncmode full` I will have access to preimages as well as all trie nodes (path) and will be able to produce a `rawDump` of the state?

author: Deleted User
content: Found the answer. If someone is pondering on the same thing -> Preimages can be "forcefully" stored if geth is synced with `--cache.preimages` option.
